original_text: and she became pregnant and gave birth to a son. When she saw that he was a fine child, she hid him for three months.
korean_text: 그 여자가 임신하여 아들을 낳으니 그가 잘 생긴 것을 보고 석 달 동안 그를 숨겼으나

sentences.original_text: and gave birth to a son
When she saw that he was a fine child
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아름다운 아이라는 것을 그녀가 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: she hid him for three months
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그를 석 달 동안 숨겼다
